name: Curious Collisions
description:
Watch + Jam 2 entry

Collision detection is difficult. It never works properly. But that's OK. I have yet to encounter a bug that can't be made into a feature, and so here we are. Collisions usually work fine from one direction, but the other way... not so much. Reach the end of each level as fast as possible, or just have fun bouncing around.

This is an incomplete jam version. More levels to hopefully come soon.

Controls:

WASD to move
Mouse to look
R to restart level
Esc to exit
